name: AMANITA (Broken Guys)
description:
A world full of mushrooms, creatures and effects!

Game made for  MAGE Jam

Theme: Side Effect

Authorial assets

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD
Z / Enter: Select 

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move 

X / Space: Jump 

E / Z : Use Item 

Up Arrow: Change Item

 ESC: Pause 

GAMEPAD

A: Select/Jump 

Joystick: Move 

B: Use item

LT / LB / RT / RB: Change Item 

Start: Pause

DEVELOPED BY:

Programmer -  @luisooliveirasz 

Sound Designer -  @Thameuszin

Composer -  @miranhas2

Artist -  @Felgardd  &  @letalsloth

Game Designer -   dev.ardock
